What is NXDOMAIN or DNS NXDOMAIN Flood DDoS Attack?

What is NXDOMAIN and how can it be exploited? Find out more about how to prevent DNS NXDOMAIN flood DDoS attacks, where the attacker overwhelms the Domain Name System (DNS) server.
Questions

Low and Slow DDoS Attacks

A Low and Slow DDoS attack, also known as a slow-rate attack, involves what appears to be legitimate traffic at a very slow rate. This type of state exhaustion DDoS attack targets application and server resources and is difficult to distinguish from normal traffic. Common attack tools include Slowlo
Questions

SSL/TLS Exhaustion DDoS Attacks

As more transactions and services are protected by SSL, DDoS attacks on SSL secured services are on the rise. Find out more about SSL/TLS exhaustion DDoS attacks.

NETSCOUT Partners with UMass Lowell to Protect the University’s Network from Cyber Attacks

WESTFORD, Mass., June 5, 2019 – NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC., (NASDAQ: NTCT), a leading provider of service assurance, security, and business analytics, announced today that it is partnering with the University of Massachusetts Lowell (UMass Lowell) to protect the university’s network from cyber attacks
